text: Koto Shopno Koto Asha is a 2017 Bengali romance-action film written and directed by Wakil Ahmed and starring Pori Moni and Bappy Chowdhury. It began filming on 3 January 2016, and was released on 13 January 2017. == Cast == * Pori Moni * Bappy Chowdhury == Music Director== * Ali Akram Shuvo Lyricist: Munshi Wadud == Singers == * Imran *Kona, *Monir Khan, *Nancy, *Kheya, Razib ==References== Category:Bengali-language films Category:Bangladeshi films Category:2010s Bengali-language films
title: Koto Shopno Koto Asha
